snippet.title: SLOPECRASHERS - Arcade Snowboarding Returns - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is the limited time demo trailer for Slopecrashers - aired during Guerrilla Collective 2022 as part of the Summer Games Fest 2022!

Slopecrashers is an arcade snowboard combat racer in which a wild crew of animals band together in a world spanning tour to become pro snowboarders!
The game's target release date is Winter 2022 and it will come to Nintendo Switch, PC & more. 

You can also wishlist the game now on Steam and also check out the limited time demo! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619580/Slopecrashers/

--------------------------------------------------
MUSIC: The music in this trailer (and also in the game) is done by Benedict Nichols - https://www.benedictnichols.com/
--------------------------------------------------

I hope you enjoy the latest trailer and stay tuned for updates on the social media channels!

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/byteparrot
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/byteparrot
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/byteparrot

Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@byteparrot
Blog: https://www.byteparrot.com/blog

Behind the scenes:

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCejqsUBleehDMoUCMiEH7mA
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/peekstone
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/peekstone
